name: Compliance Cal Assistant
description: AI voice assistant for compliance queries

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self' https://gemini2voice.onrender.com; script-src 'self' https://gemini2voice.onrender.com; style-src 'self' https://gemini2voice.onrender.com 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://gemini2voice.onrender.com wss://gemini2voice.onrender.com; media-src 'self' https://gemini2voice.onrender.com; img-src 'self' https://gemini2voice.onrender.com data: blob:; frame-src https://gemini2voice.onrender.com
